game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: Explore the jungle, navigate through the temple's traps, and fight off the undead guardians to reach the artifact.
game.reward: 100 gold coins, 50 experience points, and a magical amulet.

task.objective: Navigate through the jungle to reach the lost temple.
task.description: Fight off wild beasts and avoid deadly traps to reach the temple entrance.
Use your wits to disable the deadly trap and open the next chamber.
Use your combat skills to defeat the guardian and claim the artifact.
